full_summary:
### Communication Security Equipment Tender Announcement

#### Solicitation Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada has published a solicitation for the procurement of various types of communications management and monitoring equipment and associated support services.

#### Solicitation Details

* **Reference Number**: PW_KIN_555_8713
* **Solicitation Number**: W6399-21CA06/B
* **Publication Date**: November 28, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: March 31, 2025, 2:00 PM EST
* **Region**: Ontario (except National Capital Region)

#### Trade Agreements

This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-United Kingdom Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Solicitation Method

All interested suppliers may submit a bid. The tender is open to suppliers that meet the qualifications outlined in the solicitation document.

#### Evaluation Criteria

Bids will be evaluated based on price and other factors as outlined in the solicitation document.

#### Contract Term

Supply Arrangements will be issued to successful suppliers for a period of one year from the date of issue. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

#### Contact Information

For more information, please contact Sean Webster at:

* Email: [Sean.Webster@pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:Sean.Webster@pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (873) 354-9545
* Fax: (613) 545-8067

#### Solicitation Documents

The solicitation documents are available for download from the Canada Buys website: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/25](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/25).
